developer: Telda for Financial Applications Development and Technology LLC
description:
Money Reimagined!
The easiest way to send, spend, save and track your money. Download app, open your account & get your card instantly - no endless queues, no paperwork, no fuss. Order your Telda Card directly from the App. Use your card anywhere, anytime, online and in-store.

Customize your card:
- Customizable cards with bold color choices.
- Add a bit of personality to your card. Sign it, doodle it & add your favorite stickers.

Send & receive money instantly
- Send & receive money from friends and family instantly with only a few taps for free.

Insights:
- Personalize your insights experience and create categories based on your day to day expenses.
- Receive instant notifications on all account activity so you know what's happening with your account 24/7.
- Plan monthly budgets and track your spendings accordingly.

Stay Secured:
- Protect all of your payments with a passcode, TouchID, or FacelD.
- Lock & Unlock your card in a single tap through the app.
- All of your information is stored securely. By law and under Central Bank of Egypt regulations, your money is protected by licensed banks.

Points:
- Earn Telda Points with every purchase and redeem them with cash & a variety of vouchers from top brands.
- Make the most out of your spending & earn 3x more Points with each purchase.

If you want to know more about Telda, please visit us at:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/teldaApp/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/teldaApp/
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/teldaApp/
Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/telda/

Welcome to InstaPay!

InstaPay enables you to send and receive money instantly 24x7 in a fast, secure and easy way through your mobile phone.

How does it work?

- Onboard your Bank Accounts & Meeza Prepaid Cards
The first step is to ensure that your mobile number is linked and registered to your account at your bank.
The second step is to ensure having a valid debit card for your bank accounts.
To onboard Meeza Prepaid cards you can use the prepaid card number.
Select your bank and follow the registration process from the app.

For step by step registration guide please visit our website https://www.instapay.eg
For Supported banks please visit our website https://www.instapay.eg

- Send and Receive Money Instantly
Send & Receive money using mobile number or Instant Payment Address in seconds safely and securely.
Send money to your friends and family from your accounts to any Bank account, Mobile wallet or electronic Cards.
For more information please visit our website https://www.instapay.eg


- Balance Inquiry and Mini-statement
Check your account balance and view the last 10 transactions on your linked accounts.

- Bill Payment Service
Pay all your bills from different billers.

- Your Safety and Security
All your transaction is done through the secured Instant Payment Network, and all your information and data are handled by licensed banks under the Central Bank of Egypt Regulations.

All of your bills and payments made easy in one app, and now your banking is on myfawry too!

Now you can apply for your yellowcard, the free prepaid card from myfawry, designed to give you more control over your money and to make your banking experience so much easier.
 
Paying your bills couldn’t get easier

Pay your bills the fast and easy way: 
- Add your debit or credit card only one time to myfawry, and pay all your bills in seconds 
- Use your yellowcard to pay and keep all your transactions in one app
- Pay your bank loans or due installments from a variety of apps, syndicates, traffic fines and car license renewal, social insurance, insurance policies and many more services

Only YOU have access to myfawry
- login using Face ID or fingerprint makes sure only you can use the app 
- login using a secure password

myfawry app has all the bills and services you need to pay
- All your home bills, mobile and internet bills 
- Recharge your credit across all networks 

Pay all your due bills with a single tap using QuickPay
- Add all your monthly or recurring bills to your QuickPay list and pay everything together 
- We’ll send you reminders when your bills are available to pay 


myfawry yellowcard
One card, one app - unlimited opportunities   

Apply for your yellowcard now for FREE from myfawry app with your national ID only, and pick it up from over 200 Fawry Plus stores across Egypt.
 
Add money from anywhere and start your experience:
- Transfer money into your card from your registered bank cards on myfawry app (we accept debit and credit) 
- Fawry POS machines
- Over 200 Fawry Plus stores
- Transfer money using InstaPay directly into your yellowcard
Need cash? Withdraw money on the go 
- Any Fawry POS
- Over 200 Fawry Plus stores
- Banque Misr ATMs
- Local banks ATMs 

Lost or stolen card?
Lock and unlock your card from the app, and you can even report it as stolen and issue a new one that you can pick up right away from any Fawry Plus store.

Not sure where all your money has gone?
Forget mid-month confusion and track all your transactions that we’ve categorized for you to help you learn your spending habits and have better control over your money

Overspending is a thing of the past:
Control your budget by setting a monthly limit for your yellowcard right from myfawry app, and you can change it or remove it anytime you want

Want instant discounts? Pay with your yellowcard:
Get instant discounts upon paying at any of our partner merchants, simply by using the yellowcard. No extra steps needed!

Don’t go anywhere to change your PIN code:
You can reset your PIN code if you’ve forgotten it, or simply change it whenever you want right from myfawry app

Apply for your yellowcard now!

yellowcard is a prepaid card in partnership with Banque Misr and Meeza and is licensed and regulated by the Central Bank of Egypt .

What is Halan App?

The application provides smart solutions for financial services: that make it easier for BNPL, Lending, Payments, and online shopping.
Halan is an Egyptian Fintech application providing funding solutions for small businesses and consumer financing away from the banking system. We also allow you to purchase on an installment basis without the hassle of opening a bank account through our Buy Now Pay Later solution. Also, you can easily pay for your purchases in cash using the application. Halan also lets you pay any bill payment and receive/send money at the touch of a button through our simple and hassle-free application.

Halan BNPL:
Buy Now Pay Later service including:
Mobile phones, furniture, home appliances, electronics, education, medical, and trips with small installments easily and safely on Halan App or through our +5000 vendors.
The best BNPL service without any banking procedures, down payment, or extra administrative fees with installments over 30 months.

How to apply for BNPL services from Halan?

Buy all your needs and pay later, over different repayment periods, apply for the easiest BNPL from Halan.
Download the application, select Halan offers, select the product, and add it to the cart, or you can buy directly from our +5000 vendors.  

How to benefit from BNPL service with Halan vendors?

Go to our vendors, mention that you need to benefit from Halan’s BNPL, choose your repayment period, you will get an OTP, show it to the vendor, and confirm the request. And enjoy buying all your needs from all our vendors of home appliances, electronics, mobile phones, and furniture.

Main requirements:
Age from 21-60
Valid National ID

Halan shopping:

E-Commerce: You can easily buy (Home Appliances – Electronics – Mobiles and accessories) and pay in cash, credit cards, or using Halan’s BNPL service easily on the application for a smooth shopping experience.

Halan Gomla: With a few clicks get all your needs of groceries, personal care, and hygiene products in bulk at wholesale prices, delivered to your doorstep within 24 hours only with Halan Gomla on Halan App.

How to order from Halan Gomla?

Download Halan app, select Halan Gomla, select your products add them to the cart, select the payment method, and your order will be at your doorstep within 24 hours also it will be free delivery for orders exceeding 400 L.E.
Stay tuned for Halan Gomla’s hot deals.

Halan Lending:

Halan with “Tasaheel lending company”, provides quick and hassle-free lending for all industries. You can apply for micro-lending from 3000 LE to 200.000 LE
Apply now for lending service from Halan App and receive it from Tasaheel.

How to get your business funded through Halan app?

Get your business the needed funds with the easiest steps, safest ways, and without restricted bank procedures.
Download Halan app, select “Apply now”, scan your national ID, answer the questions, and our representative will contact you, and once your application is approved, you will receive your loan from “Tasaheel”.

Minimum requirements:
Age from 21-60
Valid National ID

How to pay bills on Halan app?

Pay all your bills from your home with hassle-free steps:
Download Halan App, select “payments service”, identify the type of the bill and entity of issuance, and enter the subscription code along with your mobile number. Review all the transaction details and the payment will be deducted from your Halan wallet balance after confirmation.

Thndr, Egypt's # 1 investing app with over 3 million downloads. It’s the easiest way to invest and save with stocks, mutual funds & gold. 


EASY TO START
Invest, save, and start building your wealth with same-day account opening - no branch visits required!


NO ACCOUNT MINIMUM
Invest and save with whatever amount you’re comfortable with - there is no minimum to start investing.


FLEXIBLE FUND-IN
Topping up your Thndr wallet is only a few taps away - with Instapay, bank transfers, Vodafone Cash, and more.


Thndr Learn
Investing is explained simply with easy-to-understand financial content and the chance to practice investing strategies with our stock market simulator.



24/7 SUPPORT
Thndr’s dedicated support team is available around the clock through our in-app chat to answer your questions about Thndr and help you with whatever you need on your investment journey.



SECURE ACCOUNTS
Invest with confidence knowing that Thndr follows the best financial security practices. With industry-leading multi-factor authentication, we make sure that only you can access your money, savings, and investments on Thndr.


PROTECTED BY THE LAW
Thndr is licensed by the Egyptian Financial Regulatory Authority (FRA). This means that Thndr follows a set of rules that are designed to protect your investments in the Egyptian stock market & mutual funds.



Thndr is an owned subsidiary of Axis Markets B.V.
Thndr is licensed by the Egyptian Financial Regulatory Authority.
Thndr is a member of the Egyptian Stock Exchange.


Office Address: 24 Street 11, Maddi, Cairo Egypt

EFFORTLESS SCAN AND PAY

DAILY EXCLUSIVE OFFERS

Manage your finances the right way.. It’s not right unless it’s TRU!

Download TRU now

Valu is a Universal Financial Technology Powerhouse, providing cutting-edge financial solutions and services that empower individuals to pursue their aspirations.

We developed our offerings to provide you with everything you need through one platform. Our expanded suite of fully digitized products and services will empower individuals and businesses and foster financial inclusion.



Besides the BNPL, Valu offers an instant cash redemption program, savings solution, investment products, B2B services and more. Hence, it was about time for Valu to undergo a brand restructuring to reflect the breadth and depth of its brand portfolio, and its current position as a universal financial technology powerhouse.

developer: dot for electronic development and electronic payment
description:
From a credit limit with flexible installments, to everyday spending, family budgets and rewards. Klivvr gives you one place to manage it all.


— Buy now, pay later with Klivvr credit

• Apply for a credit limit and get your approval instantly.
• Claim offers and pay over flexible installment plans.
• Transparent terms, clear schedules, no hidden charges; just fair, flexible credit when you need it.


— Keep the whole household covered with our Family Plan

• Get up to 4 extra cards.
• Transfer instantly between your cards, whenever you need to, with zero fees.
• Link your extra cards to your family members and manage it all from one app.
• Assign permission types for each family member and decide who can access or just view, while staying in charge of every card. More freedom for them, more control for you.


— Spend, save, and stay in control

• Shop online, tap in-store, or withdraw cash anytime, anywhere.
• Add money using InstaPay, Fawry, or an external bank card, top up anytime, anywhere.
• Send and request money from any Klivvr user in seconds.
• Track every transaction in real time, so you always know where your money goes.


— Earn K Points every time you pay

• Earn points automatically on every purchase, big or small.
• Redeem your K Points for cash to use for your next purchase.


— Join our Challenges

• Take on fun spending challenges every month.
• Hit your goals and collect bonus K Points to redeem for cash.
• Gamify your everyday spend, save more, earn more, enjoy more.


 — More benefits, more savings

• Enjoy hand-picked debit offers, discounts, and rewards.
• Get notified about new deals that help you save every time you pay.
• Monthly installment offers to make the most of your money.


Stay in control, stay protected. Your money is always secure with us — with smart security, instant card lock, and real human support whenever you need it. We’ve got your back.

mylo app is your financial partner wherever you go. 
Whether you want to manage your cash flow, get ready for marriage, buy devices and appliances, manage your lifestyle needs, or simply pay later for any other reason, we have got you covered.

Through our flexible payment plans and Sharia-compliant terms, we aim to simplify access to financial well-being for everyone and empower you to take a step forward.

In short, here's what you get when you start using mylo:
• Zero hidden fees: What you see as the total amount is what you pay. We are committed to providing you with a transparent experience, allowing you to view all the details of your purchase along with any additional rates.
• Islamic Sharia compliance: We have designed a fully Sharia-compliant consumer finance app following Murabha Islamic regulations. We ensure your consent throughout the purchase journey with Murabha terms and conditions to guarantee halal payments.
• Flexible payment options: We offer various installment plans to suit your financial needs and plans. You can choose to pay over 6 to 48 months, with or without a down payment, according to your preference.
• Generous credit limit without compromising easy repayment: We provide a credit limit that aligns with your profile and capacity to repay, ensuring that repayment is no longer a concern.
• Pay later anywhere: We are actively expanding our partner list to enable you to purchase anything, whether it's a product or a service, and pay later using our flexible payment plans.

Download mylo now and discover your favorite stores!

The National Bank of Egypt offers you advanced digital banking services that enable you to complete your banking transactions easily and in complete security.

·         Instantly review all types of accounts/investment certificates/savings certificates/mutual funds/prepaid cards/ credit cards.

·         Purchase/redeem investment certificates/savings certificates/mutual funds, and time deposits.
·         Use Fawry’s payment services “Fawry”.
·         Apply for credit cards/loans.

·         Login using (Touch ID/Face ID )

From top restaurants, cafes, and entertainment spots for all ages, to everyday services like bill payments, gaming vouchers, and even bus ticket bookings — Waffarha helps you make the most of every day.

Enjoy unbeatable deals from trusted brands, with discounts reaching up to 70%. Just download the app, sign up, and start exploring offers across all your favorite categories.

BM Online is a full-fledged Mobile Banking solution, designed to offer you a convenient, friendly and secure access to your BM accounts, anytime, anywhere. 
Features to stay on top of your finances

1. Accounts
• Access your accounts anytime
• Inquire on your balance
• View your mini-statement and your transaction history

2. Transfer
Manage your beneficiaries and perform fund transfers securely:
• Between your own accounts
• To another BM account
• To other local bank accounts in EGP
• For scheduled payments (standing orders)


3. Cards
Manage your BM cards easily by:
• Viewing your card details
• Reloading your BM prepaid card
• Repaying your BM credit card

5. Service Requests
• Request for a cheque book
• Perform a Stop Cheque
• Report a lost card
• Create Term Deposit
• Create Certificate of Deposit
• Create C.A.S.A. Account
• Leave Feedback
Security
Your BM Online offers you a secure and trusted Mobile Banking experience through:
• User ID
• WAS authentication
• Transaction Password
1. Click on the Register button from the Login page.
2. Insert your BM Internet Banking National ID, select Card Type and the enter your card and accept the terms & conditions.
3. Insert your card details like Pin/Expiry.
4. Insert the OTP (One Time Password) that will be sent to you via SMS on your registered mobile number or email address.
5. Key in a valid user id and password and you are now connected to your Bank.

Contact us
For more information, visit any of our branches or contact us on:
Tel: +2019888
Email: Internetandmobilebanking@banquemisr.com
Website: www.banquemisr.com

description: Buy Now and Pay Later with Souhoola application.you just need to download the app and apply for your limit to enjoy a seamless shopping experience from a wide network of brands and stores.

The CIB Mobile Banking app just got even better and has been completely redesigned to offer a more intuitive, user-friendly, and secure banking experience!
Here's what's new:

**Sleek and Modern Design: Enjoy a fresh and intuitive interface for easy navigation of your finances.

** Enhanced Functionality: Access all your banking needs in one place, from managing Accounts, Cards, Investments, and Payments to Transfers. * Seamless Navigation: Find what you need quickly with streamlined menus and intuitive navigation.

** Benefits:
   * Save Time: Manage your finances on the go, anytime, anywhere. 
   * Simplify Banking: Enjoy a more convenient and efficient way to bank. 
   * Gain Control: Take charge of your finances with easy-to-use tools and features.

** Features & Services:
   * Easy Login: Use biometrics (fingerprint or face-ID) for quick access.
   * Account Management: Open Accounts, view balances, accounts’ statements, transactions, and product details.
   * Card Management: More control over your card management online, replace and stop cards, and activate cards.
   * Credit Card Management: View credit cards’ balance, credit left to use, details, and transactions, and manage direct debit.
   * Transfers: Instant money transfer inside Egypt, Transfer money within and outside Egypt, settle credit cards, and schedule one-time or recurring transfers.
   * Payments: Bill & Charity payments.
   * Products: Apply for credit cards, overdrafts, and loans.
   * Investment: Manage your investment portfolio online, Buy/Sell Funds, Certificates/Time Deposits.

** Additional Services: Quick Cash, view statements, subscribe to e-statements, request chequebooks, locate branches/ATMs, currency converter, and more.


Download the CIB Mobile Banking app to manage all your banking needs conveniently in one place. Optimized for use with iOS 16.0 or later.

Join +8 million Egyptians who trust Money Fellows, Egypt’s leading personal finance and savings app, your all-in-one app for smart budgeting, goal planning, and secure digital money circles (ROSCA).  

Save smarter, plan ahead, and reach your financial goals with no debt, no credit cards, and no hidden fees. 

Fully licensed and regulated under the supervision of the Central Bank of Egypt and in partnership with Banque Misr, Money Fellows offers secure, transparent, and hassle-free financial planning, designed for your lifestyle. 

 
Save Now, Buy Later 
Designed for the modern saver, Money Fellows makes financial planning simple and stress-free. 
Build better money habits, stay in control, and plan ahead for life’s big moments, weddings, furniture, travel, or school fees, all through Money Fellows’ circles. 
 
Any Amount. Any Term. Cash Your Way 

Need 9,000 or 1,200,000? Get the cash you want for any goal and right at the time you need it,  
Choose money circles of 6, 10, or 12 months to match your plan. 
Get any amount up to 1,200,000 EGP per circle. 
Pick the payout slot that works for you and get cash. 
 
 
Lowest Fees in Egypt  
Plan smart, save more, and make your money work harder for you. 

Our smart fees drop over time starting at just 16% and going all the way to zero fees & discounted turns with savings up to 125% on last slots. 
 Get up to 20% cashback on the saving program.  
 
 
All Gain, No Pain 
No more paperwork, long queues, or endless approval cycles. Get financing from the comfort of your home. 
With our fully digital sign-up, just scan your ID and you’re ready to go. Your contract will be delivered to your doorstep. 
Pay using: Money Fellows Card, Instapay, Fawry, bank account, or e-wallets 
Get Paid via: Money Fellows Card, bank account, or e-wallets 
Spend it, save it, or invest it, your payout, your rules. 

 

Full Visibility at Every Step 

Stay in control with complete visibility over your money circles, payments, and payouts.  

Get instant reminders before due dates 
See real-time progress toward your savings goals 
 
One Card. All the Perks. 

Powered by MasterCard, the Money Fellows Prepaid Card lets you pay your installments and receive your payouts with zero service fees. 
Pay online and in-store hassle free with your card. 
Get cashback and exclusive discounts at Egypt’s top brands. 
All you need is your ID. 
 

Powered by Financial Leaders 

Enjoy guaranteed payouts with your money fully protected under the Central Bank of Egypt’s Regulatory Sandbox and in partnership with Banque Misr. Every transaction is licensed, secure, and transparent. 

 

 

Download Money Fellows today, the smarter way to save, spend, and upgrade your financial life, all in one secure, simple app.

AMAN App offers a way to easily pay your bills, re-charge as well as to check AMAN products and buy with affordable installments & payment methods.

With AMAN mobile application you can apply on your AMAN installment card, view your installments, manage and pay your installments, moreover you will find the nearest AMAN STORES around you and different merchants who offer the installment services with AMAN.


AMAN, is a business line of Raya Holding, an Egyptian FINTECH Company aims at providing better life for Egyptians through comfortable, easy and available financial processes based on deep understanding of their needs and quick response to market needs, which leads to a full coverage and providing of financial services that they need.

*WHAT IS FLASH?*
A convenient and secure way to make instant digital payments with your phone, replacing the hassle of carrying cash or cards and tracking your spending habits.




SECURITY FIRST:
Licensed, encrypted and secure.


Flash is licensed by the Central Bank of Egypt with all payments being fully encrypted and securely processed through Banque Misr. To ensure enhanced and personalized security, Face ID or fingerprints are used for both payment and login confirmation making it easy to access your account while keeping your information safe.




*SCAN AND PAY*
Pay with your phone in-store and on delivery.


In-store —- You don’t need cash, your cards or a POS machine to pay, just scan the QR code provided by our partner merchant(s) and use any of your pre-saved cards or digital wallets to pay.


Delivery —- No more paying for anything you’re uncertain of, replace cash on delivery with Flash on delivery. Receive your order, love it, scan it then pay it!


*You can pay remotely by uploading the QR code through the app to proceed with the payment wherever you are.
*Choose one of your saved cards or digital wallets on the app and pay easily with biometric authentication (FaceID or fingerprints.) No OTP or CVV is required!








GET BILL REMINDERS
Never miss a bill again! Access a wide range of bill payment services and with our customizable bill reminders feature, you just add your details once and we’ll take care of reminding you when they’re due!




*BILL SERVICES*
*Air recharge & mobile bill payment (Etisalat, Orange, Vodafone, We)
*DSL bill payment and top up
*Landline bill Payment (WE)
*Electricity bill payment (South Cairo, North Cairo, Alexandria, Canal Electricity)
*Gas bill payment (Petrotrade, TaQa, NatGas)
*Water bill payment (Alexandria, Giza, Marsa Matrouh Water Companies)
*Online games (PlayStation cards, Xbox, PUBG)
*Entertainment / TV Subscriptions (TOD, beIN Sports)
*Education (Cairo University, Ain Shams University)
*Installments (Valu, Contact, Sohoula)
*Donations (Misr El Kheir Association, 57357 Hospital, Al Orman, Egyptian Food Bank, Resala)




*FINANCIAL WELLNESS*
Overwhelmed by money matters and you ask yourself “where did my money go?!” often? 


Flash provides you with insights on your spendings and how you compare to the average user, to know the categories where you overspend.


Get your daily dose of learning about money through our tailored educational content in the form of short Flash Facts and easy-to-digest blog posts that explain complex financial concepts in simple terms.






EASY & FAST FROM SIGN UP TO PAYMENT:
Sign up in 2 steps only, then add any card (credit or debit or prepaid) just once on the app and everytime you pay, just use your biometrics (FaceID or fingerprints) to authenticate - no OTP or CVV is required!

Don’t want to add your card? You can link any digital wallet (Vodafone Cash, Orange Cash, Smart Wallet. etc).




REACH US ANYTIME:
Our support team is always available to help you with any questions or concerns you may have, don’t hesitate to reach out for our help when you need it, we’re one click away - you can find the support icon on the upper right corner of the homescreen.

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

COMPLIANCE & SECURITY YOU CAN TRUST

With a wide network of partner merchants across categories such as electronics, home appliances, fashion, and travel, FORSA BNPL makes high-value purchases more accessible without the need for traditional banking facilities.
 
فرصة هي المنصة الرائدة من شركة درايف فاينانس لخدمة "اشتريِ الآن وادفع لاحقًا"، والتي تمنح العملاء المرونة لشراء ما يحتاجونه اليوم وسداد قيمته على أقساط ميسرة. من خلال شبكة واسعة من الشركاء التجاريين في مجالات الإلكترونيات، والأجهزة المنزلية، والأزياء، والسفر، تجعل فورسا عمليات الشراء الكبيرة أكثر سهولة دون الحاجة إلى الإجراءات البنكية التقليدية.
